# Unipi Control OS Helpers

Useful tools for the [Unipi Control OS](https://github.com/superbox-dev/unipi-control-os).

## Commands

| Commands                 | Description                               |
|--------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| `os-tools backup config` | Backup Unipi Control configuration files. |
